parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post's title explicitly mentions "Liviu Lazăr - candidat PNCR pentru Senatul României", clearly identifying a candidate for the Romanian Senate from the PNCR party.  This directly satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a wide audience, not just a specific individual. The reach estimate of 500K-1M further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post promotes a YouTube video featuring a PNCR Senate candidate. The clear objective is to increase awareness and potentially influence voters to support this candidate. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the video might contain some informational elements, the primary purpose of the Facebook post is not journalistic. It's promotional material designed to garner support for a specific candidate during the election period.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's promoting a political candidate. The context is clearly electoral propaganda.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>4137407953158994</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 4137407953158994, promotes a YouTube video featuring Liviu Lazăr, a PNCR candidate for the Romanian Senate.  The post's title explicitly names the candidate and party, directly targeting the electorate.  The paid nature of the advertisement on a public platform, coupled with the reach estimate (500K-1M), indicates an intention to reach a wide audience. The clear objective is to influence voters in favor of the candidate, fulfilling the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The post does not fall under any of the allowed exceptions.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Liviu Lazăr</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Sebastian - Tiberiu Pop</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Pop Sebastian Tiberiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 4137407953158994), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Liviu Lazăr la Senat din partea PNCR, prin intermediul unui videoclip YouTube. Reclama, cu o estimare a audienței de 500.000 - 1.000.000 de persoane și o cheltuială de 100-199 RON, îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale, având ca scop influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului menționat. Titlul reclamei ("PODCAST ELECTORAL | Liviu Lazăr - candidat PNCR pentru Senatul României") și conținutul acesteia, care direcționează utilizatorii către un videoclip de campanie, constituie dovezi clare ale intenției de a influența procesul electoral.  Contact: contact@sebastiantiberiupop.ro, +40760256257.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
